thread.title: The Legends of Tomorrow Protect George Washington in "Turncoat" Synopsis
thread.title_full: The Legends of Tomorrow Protect George Washington in "Turncoat" Synopsis

author: Russ Burlingame
title: The Legends of Tomorrow Protect George Washington in "Turncoat" Synopsis
text:
The Legends of Tomorrow Protect George Washington in "Turncoat" Synopsis Russ Burlingame Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
The CW has released the official synopsis for "Turncoat," Febuary 7's episode of DC's Legends of Tomorrow . 
The episode brings the team back to the days of the American revolution, where they will have to protect George Washington, even while the Waverider is out of commission. (Photo: The CW) 
You can check it out below. 
A GOOD FIGHT — When The Legends find a new Time Aberration they learn they must travel to the winter of 1776 to protect George Washington and the American Revolutionary War. Unfortunately, things don’t go as planned, forcing Sara (Caity Lotz) to send out Nate (Nick Zano) and Amaya (Maisie-Richardson-Sellers) to help. 
Meanwhile, Jax (Franz Drameh) and Stein (Victor Garber) who are busy protecting the incapacitated Waverider from their new enemy, are forced to step into roles that they don’t think they are prepared for. Brandon Routh, Dominic Purcell and Arthur Darvill also star. 
Alice Troughton directed the episode, written by Grainne Godfree & Matthew Maala.
